channel.title: Teleto
channel.description: Hi is there anyway to make a command like xteletome except it teles you to the player? if so wat would the code be? please help, thanks

item.title: Teleto
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Project Evolution, post:3, topic:226428”][code]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights == 2))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
teleportToX = p.absX;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}[/code]

Should work.[/quote]
That is really poor code.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleto
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights == 2))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
teleportToX = p.absX;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
// PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}[/code]

Should work.
